data.actual_result: the code block get cut off in embeds and are hard to really work with in discord.
data.expected_result: A horizontal scrollbar appears so all code block text can be read.
data.short_description: Bot embed code blocks do not show a horizontal scrollbar but cut off text.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot create a code block in an embed with lots of text in the code block - observe how the code block gets cut off and you can not read the whole code block making it hard to work with
